title: Scotland ‘moving politically backwards’ under the SNP, says Alex Salmond

title: Humza Yousaf says Keir Starmer may 'tweak' Scottish island asylum plan

title: Starmer wants to tackle civil service ‘churn’ – report
description: Sir Keir Starmer will seek to bring stability among senior civil servants if Labour wins the next general election, according to reports.

title: Keir Starmer told to 'disown' Blair government's Mull asylum plans
description: AN SNP MP has asked if Keir Starmer will “disown” plans drafted up by Tony Blair’s Labour government to set up an asylum holding camp in Mull.
